thread.title: Ground News - It would be a shame to just stand and defend. We recognized the greatest quality, said Captain Krejčí

author: iDNES.cz
title: Ground News - It would be a shame to just stand and defend. We recognized the greatest quality, said Captain Krejčí
text: More than broken, Spartan captain Ladislav Krejčí acted amicably. “It was a collision with reality,” he agreed as he arrived among journalists after the 1:5 debacle with Liverpool in the opening eight final of football's Europa League.
